channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lifesmart TM2202 3-in-1 Treadmill Review: Best for Small Spaces
item.description: This compact, hybrid machine can morph into a walking pad, treadmill, or standing desk for small office spaces.

item.title: Apple tries to delay ruling that bars it from taking a cut on external app payments
item.description: Apple is trying to delay a court ruling that forces the company to let iOS app developers accept payments via non-Apple systems and avoid paying a cut...

item.title: VC firm Insight Partners confirms personal data stolen during January hack
item.description: The venture capital firm has over $90 billion in assets under management, including cybersecurity giants.

item.title: Asking chatbots for short answers can increase hallucinations, study finds
item.description: Turns out, telling an AI chatbot to be concise could make it hallucinate more than it otherwise would have. That’s according to a new study from Giska...

item.title: Zero Breeze Mark 3 AC Review: Effective Portable Cooling
item.description: The third iteration of the essential grab-and-go AC unit has more power, but it’s heavier and significantly pricier.

item.title: Reddit intros new profile tools for its business customers
item.description: Reddit on Thursday announced profile enhancements for businesses that use Reddit Pro, the company’s suite of tools designed to help brands discover, j...

item.title: 23 Mother's Day Gift Ideas Our Editors Have Tried and Love (2025)
item.description: From photo books and flowers to smart rings and bird feeders, we have a pick for every type of mom and mom figure.

item.title: Panasonic S1R II Review: Capable, Affordable, Mirrorless Hybrid Camera
item.description: Panasonic’s updated S1R is one of the best all-around full-frame cameras on the market.

item.title: JBL Tour One M3 Review: Great Noise-Canceling Headphones
item.description: JBL’s top wireless headphones match powerful noise canceling with tons of extras.

item.title: Why Hims & Hers turned to the autonomous vehicle industry to find an AI-savvy CTO
item.description: Hims & Hers, the telehealth and wellness company, has hired a veteran of the autonomous vehicle industry as its next chief technology officer. The mov...
